name: social_media_tips_template
description: A modern social media tips template with colorful gradient cards and star icons

samples.title: How to Grow Your Brand on Social Media
samples.tip3: Keep track of social media analytics.
samples.tip5: Engage directly with your audience online.

fieldPrompt.title: Enter the main title for your social media tips (max 100 characters)
fieldPrompt.button_text: Enter text for the call-to-action button (max 20 characters)
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override the default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace the default template structure

components.css_content: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; overflow:hidden } body { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f1eb 0%, #e8ddd4 100%); width: 1080px; height: 1350px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; padding: 60px 40px; } .container { width: 100%; max-width: 1000px; text-align: center; } .main-title { font-size: 4.5rem; font-weight: 900; color: #2c2c2c; letter-spacing: -0.02em; line-height: 1.1; margin-bottom: 80px; text-transform: uppercase; } .tips-container { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 25px; margin-bottom: 60px; } .tip-item { display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 25px 35px; border-radius: 50px; font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: 600; color: #2c2c2c; text-align: left; } .tip-item.purple { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #c8a2d8 0%, #b794c7 100%); } .tip-item.orange { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f4c791 0%, #e8b77a 100%); } .tip-item.coral { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f4a394 0%, #e89384 100%); } .tip-item.green { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a8c5a0 0%, #96b489 100%); } .tip-item.peach { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e8c4a0 0%, #d9b592 100%); } .tip-item.blue { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a8c5e8 0%, #96b4d9 100%); } .tip-item.pink { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f4a3c8 0%, #e893b7 100%); } .tip-item.teal { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a8e8d8 0%, #96d9c8 100%); } .tip-item.lavender { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d8a2e8 0%, #c794d7 100%); } .tip-item.mint { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a2e8c8 0%, #94d7b7 100%); } .star-icon { width: 35px; height: 35px; margin-right: 25px; flex-shrink: 0; } .star-icon svg { width: 100%; height: 100%; fill: #2c2c2c; } .follow-button { background: #2c2c2c; color: white; padding: 20px 50px; border-radius: 30px; font-size: 1.4rem; font-weight: 500; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; border: none; } ${custom_css}
